daily.text: Circumvent negative influences, circumstances and people.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: Draw outside the lines! Make the sky purple instead of blue! That's what it looks like to dreamers!
daily.author: Viola Shipman

daily.text: My hope fuels my determination to overcome any difficulty.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: So many of us are causing pain and suffering to ourselves on daily basis, because we do not know the value of life.
daily.author: Sunday Adelaja

daily.text: Until you prove what is in you, what is in you shall always be what is in you.
daily.author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

daily.text: Many losses have gone sinking daily by our inability to recognize the great deal of power reserved in us. Watch out and make it real because soon, it's going to be your turn to shine!
daily.author: Israelmore Ayivor

daily.text: The greatest lesson of life is that you are responsible for your life.
daily.author: Oprah Winfrey

daily.text: If we don’t live in the same vibe, it is hard to be aware of each other. When our reading differs from our neighbors’ reality, our surroundings may take a range of discordant shades and daily episodes become unrecognizable. But if we endeavor to find out, the “who is who”, the “what is what” and the “where is Waldo”, we might demonstrate our social literacy and connectedness. ('Fish for silence.').
daily.author: Erik Pevernagie

daily.text: Titles don’t mean anything. What really matters is the impact you make on a daily basis!
daily.author: Akilnathan Logeswaran

daily.text: I'm getting a daily email from Microsoft which I have been ignoring that states a hacker is trying to access my account. As far as the Microsoft account goes, the hacker can have it...Along with all of the nasty Windows 10 upgrade problems!
daily.author: Steven Magee

daily.text: Teaching does allow me to keep one foot in the youthful waters I tend to occupy in my novels, so I'm thankful for that. My students also remind me on a daily basis that the stories I collected during my district attorney days are actually interesting to people who haven't had that experience.
daily.author: Alafair Burke

daily.text: The Civil Rights Act of 1964 laid the foundation for the Voting Rights Act of 1965, but it also addressed nearly every other aspect of daily life in a would-be free democratic society.
daily.author: Aberjhani

daily.text: Failure is a sign post, directing the right road for life’s journey.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: By venturing into space, we improve life for everyone here on Earth - scientific advances and innovations that come from this kind of research create products we use in our daily lives.
daily.author: Buzz Aldrin

daily.text: We designed a car that is for daily commutes and that you charge every day. The less you use the gasoline engine, the better mpg. Essentially, the Karma can achieve dramatic savings and low CO2 output when used as intended, as a daily commuter.
daily.author: Henrik Fisker

daily.text: Daily prayer, daily grace.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: Daily fantasy sports is neither victimless nor harmless, and it is clear that DraftKings and FanDuel are the leaders of a massive, multi-billion-dollar scheme intended to evade the law and fleece sports fans across the country.
daily.author: Eric Schneiderman

daily.text: In the morning, I use a Philosophy cleanser and Olay Regenerist Daily 3 Point Treatment Cream, which sinks in well and feels firming. I rarely wear foundation, so cotton wool soaked in warm water is often enough to cleanse at night, but I take off eye make-up with Klorane's cornflower-infused remover.
daily.author: Saffron Aldridge

daily.text: By fundamentally changing how we design the places and systems that enable our daily lives, we can slash emissions way beyond the immediate carbon savings - because our own personal emissions are just the tip of a vast iceberg of energy and resources consumed far from our view.
daily.author: Alex Steffen

daily.text: Our daily prayer ought to be: Please universe, help me help myself and help me show others how to help themselves.
daily.author: Kamand Kojouri

daily.text: If you want to leave your footprints on the sands of time, be sure you’re wearing work shoes.
daily.author: Unknown

daily.text: It used to upset me - now it makes me sad - to see people use patriotism and our troops as a pawn in their political argument. Because I know personally, growing up in a military family, the sacrifice that is made on a daily basis.
daily.author: Tamron Hall

daily.text: There are problems and there are problems. One big problem and a great paradox in the arena of life is the problem of where or how a person is now and where or how he wants to be tomorrow. Had it not been this problem, we would have been relaxing all day long.
daily.author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

daily.text: Everyone at some point in life have faced rejection and failure, it is part of the process to self realisation.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: The gift of the moments and its lessons prepares us for a better tomorrow.
daily.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

daily.text: Some are condemned to remain mere “clock and smart phone watchers”, inasmuch as they are not able to read and interpret the lines of their life or don't even treasure the enchantment of daily captivating moments. If we are not prepared to give some personal time to social time, we walk like blind men through gloomy alleys of our existence. ( ' Please. Just a bit of a chat ' ).
daily.author: Erik Pevernagie

daily.text: Dreams are the guiding words of the soul. Why should I henceforth not love my dreams and not make their riddling images into objects of my daily consideration?
daily.author: Carl Jung

daily.text: I found that dance, music, and literature is how I made sense of the world... It pushed me to think of things bigger than life's daily routines... To think beyond what is immediate or convenient.
daily.author: Mikhail Baryshnikov

daily.text: They're still advertising the added health-giving advantages of vitamins in your daily diet, although it has long since been shown that you'd be better off eating Smarties.
daily.author: Terry Wogan

wanderlust.text: You can’t make a small world for yourself, because what are you going to do when that small world implodes?
wanderlust.author: S.R. Crawford

wanderlust.text: And you must not worry about me. You must follow your dreams. You have your life ahead of you. I am just a wanderer passing by.
wanderlust.author: Avijeet Das

wanderlust.text: I will never lose the love for the arriving, but I'm born to leave.
wanderlust.author: Charlotte Eriksson

wanderlust.text: One soft humid early spring morning driving a winding road across Mount Tamalpais, the 2,500-foot mountain just north of the Golden Gate Bridge, a bend reveals a sudden vision of San Francisco in shades of blue, a city in a dream, and I was filled with a tremendous yearning to live in that place of blue hills and blue buildings, though I do live there, I had just left there after breakfast.
wanderlust.author: Rebecca Solnit

wanderlust.text: And we laugh and laugh andall I know isat this moment I feel likeI can do anything I wantand be anyone I wantand go anywhere on the globeand still call it home.
wanderlust.author: Kirsten Smith

wanderlust.text: You have to keep doing it, Even if no one is watching. The best artists, are those Who live from their expressions, Not chasing the impressions.
wanderlust.author: Nikki Rowe

wanderlust.text: It might be well enough to wander if you've a place and people to come back to, but I tell you now there's no desolation like wanting to go home and truly not knowing where it is.
wanderlust.author: Elizabeth Kerner

wanderlust.text: And  even if our hearts collided  Can I trust it to be  what I've always dreamed...  No dear,  it'll be so much more.
wanderlust.author: Nikki Rowe

wanderlust.text: I could give up, it's the easiest optionBut what would I achieve? Many sleepless nights holding regretOf all I didn't seek, That option will never exist to me; My dreams are far too real, Down the hard road I findMy place in the world; the closest To home Ill ever feel.
wanderlust.author: Nikki Rowe

wanderlust.text: From this point forward, you don’t even know how to quit in life.”~ Aaron Lauritsen, ‘100 Days Drive.
wanderlust.author: Aaron Lauritsen

wanderlust.text: It’s the ‘everyday’ experiences we encounter along the journey to who we wanna be that will define who we are when we get there.
wanderlust.author: Aaron Lauritsen

wanderlust.text: The beauty he saw in her was the beauty she forgot to see in herself and what a beautiful reminder, that love is what will see us all through.
wanderlust.author: Nikki Rowe

wanderlust.text: I don't know where I am going, I just know I had to leave. Everything I was I carry with me, everything I will be lies waiting on the road ahead.
wanderlust.author: Ma Jian

wanderlust.text: Embrace all emotions: sadness, happiness, sorrow, hate, love, prejudice, fear; they are weapons against our greatest enemy: indifference.
wanderlust.author: Dave Matthes

wanderlust.text: I'm sorry! I really am! I wanted to get out of this place! I want to live! I want to get away from here and never see it again! I hate everything about it!'You will hate the next place, too,' I said. 'What you are you will carry with you.
wanderlust.author: Louis L'Amour

wanderlust.text: From centuries ago before the dawn of civilization, I have been wandering. I am the wanderer. I can't stay at one place. I am destined to wander from place to place!And I keep wandering in search of a nothingness. The river embraces me and guides me to swim inside her and to drink the nectar of love from her bosom. She tells me her secrets and I tell her mine. She makes me sensitive and soft.The mountain greets me with respect and guides me to traverse the rocks and crevices of its body! He is strong and vigorous and he appreciates my stamina and toughness.After dusk in the night, the stars smile at me and they show me light to travel in the darkness. They tell me their stories and I tell them mine.The moon embalms me with her love and she kisses me good night. The nightingale sings her song of love when I take rest in the arms of darkness in the night!And after the dawn of the morning, the sun greets me and acknowledges my spirit and strength!I am the wanderer and I keep wandering in search of a nothingness.I am the wanderer and wandering is my destiny!
wanderlust.author: Avijeet Das

wanderlust.text: I am an artist, my hair is rarely tamed & sometimes I sleep till noon, My house is messy and I speak to the moon. I care less about the materials that I share with my world and more about the passion inside myself. I'm an artist, what more can you expect? I am full of soul, love and all the rest.
wanderlust.author: Nikki Rowe

wanderlust.text: Women have routinely been punished and intimidated for attempting that most simple of freedoms, taking a walk, because their walking and indeed their very beings have been construed as inevitably, continually sexual in those societies concerned with controlling women's sexuality.
wanderlust.author: Rebecca Solnit

wanderlust.text: This was what my spirit longed to do, to wander in strange lands. It couldn't stand being trapped in one body all the time. It had wanderlust.
wanderlust.author: Samantha Shannon

wanderlust.text: Didn't know where I was going. Didn't care where I ended up. I knew I'd be okay though.
wanderlust.author: Darnell Lamont Walker

wanderlust.text: There is a whole generation of young people just like us wandering around Europe and the rest of the world, trying to find some meaning for why they are alive and what they should choose to do with their time. When Martha leaves and we sit in front of the fire in the living room, I look to Lily until she turns to me and I can see the grief that hides just under the surface of her expression. We are, or at least were, two of those lost souls: wanderers, backpackers, season workers, Wwoofers, Workawayers, travellers: searching the world for something or someplace to hold on to. And we have come home not because we have retired from trying to find answers and are ready to settle into adulthood, but because my death has come upon us fast and unexpected. I am not the first person of this generation of travellers- or any person who lives in this godless, superficial society- to die. But I think that it feels to Lily and to me, my mother too perhaps, that I may very well be.
wanderlust.author: Annie Fisher

wanderlust.text: Travel is costly yes, but it pays dividends too.
wanderlust.author: Aaron Lauritsen

wanderlust.text: Wanderlust is incurable.
wanderlust.author: Mark Jenkins

wanderlust.text: It was the inverse of an island in the sea.
wanderlust.author: Elisabeth Eaves

wanderlust.text: She's an old soul with young eyes, a vintage heart, and a beautiful mind.
wanderlust.author: Nicole Lyons

wanderlust.text: There's a race of men that don't fit in, A race that can't sit still;So they break the hearts of kith and kin, And they roam the world at will.They range the field and rove the flood, And they climb the mountain's crest; Their's is the curse of the gypsy blood, And they don't know how to rest.
wanderlust.author: Robert W. Service

wanderlust.text: Nostalgia in reverse, the longing for yet another strange land, grew especially strong in spring.
wanderlust.author: Vladimir Nabokov

wanderlust.text: Explore, Experience, Then Push Beyond.
wanderlust.author: Aaron Lauritsen

wanderlust.text: ..Luxury is the enemy of observation, a costly indulgence that induces such a good feeling that you notice nothing. Luxury spoils and infantilizes you and prevents you from knowing the world. That is its purpose, the reason why luxury cruises and great hotels are full of fatheads who, when they express an opinion, seem as though they are from another planet. It was also my experience that one of the worst aspects of travelling with wealthy people, apart from the fact that the rich never listen, is that they constantly groused about the high cost of living – indeed, the rich usually complained of being poor.
wanderlust.author: Paul Theroux

wanderlust.text: What if it's the thereand not the herethat I long for?The wanderand not the wait,the magicin the lost feetstumbling downthe faraway streetand the way the moonnever hangsquite the same.
wanderlust.author: Tyler Knott Gregson

motivational.text: If where you are is worthwhile then where you are from doesn't matter.
motivational.author: Amit Kalantri

motivational.text: The single greatest cause of happiness is gratitude.
motivational.author: Auliq-Ice

motivational.text: Make dance the mission every moment seeks to accomplish.
motivational.author: Shah Asad Rizvi

motivational.text: The strength of the spirit sustains the soul.
motivational.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

motivational.text: Times will change for the better when you change.
motivational.author: Maxwell Maltz

motivational.text: When a lion kills a deer it does not build negative KARMA, its meant that way!!!!
motivational.author: Harrish Sairaman

motivational.text: Seals:The Five Cosmic Seals are five occult Level 333, 666, 999, 1330 and 003 operating 400,000 minuet mystical degrees.
motivational.author: Compton Gage

motivational.text: Happy Mind, Happy Home.
motivational.author: Napa Kettle

motivational.text: Within us all are sages, warriors and fools; we more often that not choose the fools.
motivational.author: rassool jibraeel snyman

motivational.text: Self-liberation is the greatest victory.
motivational.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

motivational.text: We have been called to heal wounds, to unite what has fallen apart, and to bring home those who have lost their way.
motivational.author: Francis of Assisi

motivational.text: Success sits on a mountain of mistakes.
motivational.author: Bangambiki Habyarimana

motivational.text: The outcome is not up to you. The outlook is.
motivational.author: Germany Kent

motivational.text: Data has no ego and makes an excellent co-pilot.
motivational.author: Jay Samit

motivational.text: Death is not considerate, or fair.
motivational.author: Compton Gage

motivational.text: Take all of your wasted honorEvery little past frustrationTake all of your so-called problems,Better put 'em in quotations.
motivational.author: John Mayer

motivational.text: CONCERNED BUT NOT CONSUMED!
motivational.author: Ron Sanders

motivational.text: If you fuel your journey on the opinions of others, you are going to run out of gas.
motivational.author: Steve Maraboli

motivational.text: Hug your customers but also offer handshake to your competitors.
motivational.author: Amit Kalantri

motivational.text: A life full of excuses is a life full of regrets.
motivational.author: Thibaut Meurisse

motivational.text: All great people had critics, but they still believe in beauty of their dreams.
motivational.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

motivational.text: With every step we take we have a choice to make. Our choices determine our actions. Our actions determine who we are.
motivational.author: Randall Marr

motivational.text: It is nobody’s responsibility but yours to discover your assignment and to execute that very assignment.
motivational.author: D.S. Mashego

motivational.text: No matter what your history has been, your destiny is what you create today. What are you going to create?
motivational.author: Steve Maraboli

motivational.text: Make a little effort to give up your insignificant quarrels and eventually a better world will follow.
motivational.author: Abhijit Naskar

motivational.text: To become a better you, remember to be grateful to people who have contributed to making you who you are today.
motivational.author: Israelmore Ayivor

love.text: I laughed as we turned in a tight circle... 'Tonight you're all mine.'Jake smiled but looked me dead in the eye. 'No. From now on.'My heart skipped. 'What?'Yours,' he said simply, 'from now on.
love.author: Kieran Scott

love.text: The good news is, shame has a kryptonite. Shame cannot survive under the power of love. Love defeats shame, every time. Love says that no matter what you did which may have caused guilt, you are loved. You are lovable. You are love itself. That is the truth. And because of that, you have nothing to be ashamed of.
love.author: Stephen Lovegrove

love.text: To reciprocate God’s love is to have the nature of love.
love.author: Sunday Adelaja

love.text: A great giftwe can giveto ourselvesis a willingnessto love everyone,no matter what.This frees us completely from the toxicjustificationswe use to hate.
love.author: Scott Stabile

love.text: This was worse than a coke binge. Worse than black tar or the thrill of E. This was the devil himself snaking his way inside of my heart and bending me to his will. This was addiction, quickly morphing into obsession. And somewhere in the clouded fog that was my brain, I knew this was a game I was going to lose.
love.author: A. Zavarelli

love.text: Your perspective changes relative to the frame through which you see things.
love.author: Mensah Oteh

love.text: I just never noticed how little of me existed before. I was a shadow without a person.
love.author: Michael J. Sullivan

love.text: I sing to use the waiting,  My bonnet but to tie, And shut the door unto my house;  No more to do have I, Till, his best step approaching,  We journey to the day, And tell each other how we sang  To keep the dark away.
love.author: Emily Dickinson

love.text: She was learning something important: how to live within the sound of her own slow breathing, how to love the view when her eyes were shut.
love.author: Gwendoline Riley

love.text: Your mind is the most powerful magnet. What you think, you attract.
love.author: Debasish Mridha

love.text: We have to consciously study how to be tender with each other until it becomes a habit because what was native has been stolen from us, the love of Black women for each other.
love.author: Audre Lorde

love.text: They did not use the sonic stunners but the foray gun, the ancient weapon that fires a set of metal fragments in a burst. They shot to kill him. He was dying when I got to him, sprawled and twisted away from his skis that stuck up out of the snow, his chest half shot away. I took his head in my arms and spoke to him, but he never answered me; only in a way he answered my love for him, crying out through the silent wreck and tumult of his mind as consciousness lapsed, in the unspoken tongue, once, clearly, 'Arek!' Then no more. I held him, crouching there in the snow, while he died. They let me do that. Then they made me get up, and took me off one way and him another, I going to prison and he into the dark.
love.author: Ursula K. Le Guin

love.text: Southern gentleman,” he said aside to him in Arabic. “Do you wish for me to continue this for you?”Caine’s temper shifted to a low simmer in his chest. “Your way takes too long.”“Ma’aleyk, and your way hurts my ears,” he argued.
love.author: V.S. Carnes

love.text: Cassia.I know which life is my real one now, no matter what happens. It’s the one with you. For some reason, knowing that even one person knows my story makes things different. Maybe it’s like the poem says. Maybe this is my way of not going gentle.I love you. (Ky Markham).
love.author: Ally Condie

love.text: I turn my head so that he doesn't see my smile and secretly curse him for making me feel special.
love.author: Kasie West

love.text: Happiness is in contentment, gratitude, and love. It is a lifestyle, not a location.
love.author: Ogwo David Emenike

love.text: Love people. Use things. The opposite never works.
love.author: The Minimalists

love.text: We heal up through being loved, and through loving others. We don't heal by forming a secret society of one - by assessing about the only other 'one' we might admit, and being doomed to disappointment.
love.author: Jeanette Winterson

love.text: How little we know the ones we love. How little we know of anyone, in the end.
love.author: Aria Beth Sloss

love.text: Oh how I had underestimated tender kisses.
love.author: Cora Carmack

love.text: It's so difficult to love another person and yourself for who they are and not what they do or who they could be. To stay in this moment and know it in all its pleasure and its pain. The world is a beautiful place. How often do we say this aloud?
love.author: Vicki Forman

love.text: I'd love to promise a lifetime to you. I just don't have one to give.
love.author: Kelly Rimmer

love.text: It is well to believe that there needs but a little more thought, a little more courage, more love, more devotion to life, a little more eagerness, one day to fling open wide the portals of joy and of truth.
love.author: Maurice Maeterlinck

love.text: How queer it was for two lovers to suddenly turn into strangers?
love.author: Diyar Harraz

love.text: If your consciousness is without form, without quality, and without characteristics of any kind, would that not imply that the consciousness in every other being is also formless? And if they are all without form, how can you distinguish their consciousness from your own? What forms would you use to compare them? Isn’t the observing you exactly the same as the observing them?
love.author: Joseph P. Kauffman

love.text: And then there will be the times when I see you laughing. Like the time you’ll be playing with the neighbor’s puppy, poking your hands through the chain-link fence separating our back yards, and you’ll be laughing so hard you’ll start hiccupping. The puppy will run inside the neighbor’s house, and your laughter will gradually subside, letting you catch your breath. Then the puppy will come back to the fence to lick your fingers again, and you’ll shriek and start laughing again. It will be the most wonderful sound I could ever imagine, a sound that makes me feel like a fountain, or a wellspring.
love.author: Ted Chiang

love.text: My heart was in my mouth. I realised that I had no desire to know any more about her past. What was behind her made me feel sick, petrified. Only the future mattered now.
love.author: Ruth Ahmed

love.text: She cast her fragrance and her radiance over me. I ought never to have run away from her... I ought to have guessed all the affection that lay behind her poor little stratagems. Flowers are so inconsistent! But I was too young to know how to love her...
love.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

love.text: There is a cause/effect relationship between your investment in yourself and the future you have.
love.author: Mensah Oteh

happiness.text: One could be happy not only without love, but despite it.
happiness.author: Gabriel García Márquez

happiness.text: Happiness does not come from a job. It comes from knowing what you truly value, and behaving in a way that’s consistent with those beliefs.
happiness.author: Mike Rowe

happiness.text: We cannot really love anybody with whom we never laugh.
happiness.author: Agnes Repplier

happiness.text: The body is doing the action, body’s spare-parts are doing the action and the egoism simply does the egoism of, ‘I did’! Subtle-pride of egoism is created from this doer-ship and one is living due entirely on this basis. He simply tastes the subtle-pride of doer-ship; ‘I did’, ‘I suffered this pain’, ‘I enjoyed that happiness’. The person who gets rid of this subtle-pride will get freedom. Why does one taste this sweetness of subtle-pride of doership from infinite lives? He does this because he has never before tasted the sweetness of the Soul.
happiness.author: Dada Bhagwan

happiness.text: Your mind is the most powerful magnet. What you think, you attract.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: The single greatest cause of happiness is gratitude.
happiness.author: Auliq-Ice

happiness.text: We have to change every day to survive, but we fear change the most.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: Love is the moonlight when the moon is your heart.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: Manifest kindness to embrace greatness.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: Learn to let urgency go. Nothing is urgent. Stress is the product of uncertainty and urgency of life.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: Let us be kind and compassionate to all beings. Everyone wants to enjoy their lives, everyone has sufferings, and everyone wants peace and happiness.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: We want so badly to be happy – to live the kinds of lives that we always hoped we’d live – that we give gifts to ourselves by remembering things not as they were, but as we wish they were.
happiness.author: Dathan Auerbach

happiness.text: Love, I thought to myself abstractedly. Not 'This is love' or 'Is this love?' Not a sentence, not a certainty, not a thought with moving parts or direction. Just love, all of it, as it is. Whether it's enough or not. Wthether it's real or we're making it up. However shoddy it gets, or bent out of shape. It's still extraordinary. However foolish, however vain. However badly it ends. Love.
happiness.author: Julian Gough

happiness.text: Wanting help, I reached out to serve. Seeking happiness, I smiled and offered comfort. Yearning for love, I showed love. And now I understand. My life was never about me, it was always about you.
happiness.author: Richelle E. Goodrich

happiness.text: Ink runs from the corners of my mouth.There is no happiness like mine.I have been eating poetry.
happiness.author: Mark Strand

happiness.text: To promote peace, promote understanding. To promote understanding, promote love.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: Failure is a signpost on the trail to success.
happiness.author: Phillip Gary Smith

happiness.text: People who have wellbeing and feel fulfilled, need far less than people who feel unfulfilled, who always seem to need more.' By Rethinking Your Mindset you can create SWIFT sustainable success.
happiness.author: Tony Dovale

happiness.text: It is painful those feelings of pain,but accept it with love to see the gain.
happiness.author: Debasish Mridha

happiness.text: Every 'problem' we face is only a problem because of the way our mind (ego) perceives it. It is, in fact, not a problem at all but rather a lesson we are providing to ourselves in order to evolve.
happiness.author: Caroline A. Shearer

happiness.text: Man's delight in the Lord is the absolute peak of human triumph. He praises God when full of joy, and when not, he praises God to become full of joy. For to know and to live as though God is worthy of all praise, in all one's circumstances, whether seemingly good or seemingly bad, is the primary definition of joy and the richest triumph for man under God.
happiness.author: Criss Jami

happiness.text: All your strength must come from within, because no external source can provide it.
happiness.author: Stephen Richards

happiness.text: Happiness is the interval between periods of unhappiness.
happiness.author: Don Marquis

happiness.text: And then there will be the times when I see you laughing. Like the time you’ll be playing with the neighbor’s puppy, poking your hands through the chain-link fence separating our back yards, and you’ll be laughing so hard you’ll start hiccupping. The puppy will run inside the neighbor’s house, and your laughter will gradually subside, letting you catch your breath. Then the puppy will come back to the fence to lick your fingers again, and you’ll shriek and start laughing again. It will be the most wonderful sound I could ever imagine, a sound that makes me feel like a fountain, or a wellspring.
happiness.author: Ted Chiang

happiness.text: What a blessing, what a treasured friend that despair turned out to be. It continually crushed my ongoing attempts at manufacturing optimism, slowing me down, leveling me so I could return to love and begin again and again.
happiness.author: Lori Cash Richards

happiness.text: A smile puts you on the right track. A smile makes the world a beautiful place. When you lose your smile, you lose your way in the chaos of life.
happiness.author: Roy T. Bennett

happiness.text: Kahneman’s evidence shows that we suck at remembering and predicting our own well-being. We as a culture still ignore this empirical evidence, recommending to live our lives so as to avoid deathbed regrets. Deathbed regrets are like Hollywood films: they stir passions for a couple hours, but are poorly connected to reality. They are not good criteria for a well-lived life.
happiness.author: Nick Winter

happiness.text: The secret of happiness: Find something more important than you are and dedicate your life to it.
happiness.author: Daniel C. Dennett

happiness.text: I cannot think that man is meant to find happiness so easily! Happiness is like one of those palaces on an enchanted island, its gates guarded by dragons. One must fight to gain it; and, in truth, I do not know what I have done to deserve the good fortune of becoming Mercédès, husband.
happiness.author: Alexandre Dumas

happiness.text: It is by studying little things that we attain the great knowledge of having as little misery and as much happiness as possible.
happiness.author: Samuel Johnson

positive.text: You can overcome any situation with positive attitude.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: You are a wonderful sacred-soul.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: The greater part of our happiness or misery depends on our dispositions  and not our circumstances.
positive.author: Martha Washington

positive.text: The science of psychology has been far more successful on the negative than on the positive side... It has revealed to us much about man's shortcomings, his illnesses, his sins, but little about his potentialities, his virtues, his achievable aspirations, or his psychological health.
positive.author: Abraham Maslow

positive.text: When God gives you an idea, you must act immediately on it.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Not every problem can be solved. Some are okay simply to avoid. Go around the, go under them, whatever it takes to reach your higher goal. Sometimes you have to fail your way to success.
positive.author: Anna Mitchael

positive.text: Every sunset is an opportunity to reset.
positive.author: Richie Norton

positive.text: How do you nurture a positive attitude when all the statistics say you're a dead man? You go to work.
positive.author: Patrick Swayze

positive.text: My hope fuels my determination to overcome any difficulty.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: We can only reach the highest height, if we encourage each other.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: There is nothing in this world constant but inconstancy.
positive.author: Jonathan Swift

positive.text: Think like a man of action  act like a man of thought.
positive.author: Henri Bergson

positive.text: If we are not responsible for the thoughts that pass our doors  we are at least responsible for those we admit and entertain.
positive.author: Charles B. Newcomb

positive.text: May God continue to grant you more grace for your work.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Failure becomes success when it finds positive minds; Tragedy becomes melody when it lands in positive hands. With positivity, possibility is assured!
positive.author: Israelmore Ayivor

positive.text: I will sacrifice today for tomorrow.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Outside the Olympics, there are massive discrepancies within all sports. But the positive side for me is that the Olympics are the biggest platform there is, and there's total equality across all sports.
positive.author: Lizzie Armitstead

positive.text: If you don't like something don't protest from a far. Work within it to change it. Otherwise, you'll just be one voice of many rather than a trusted voice of influence.
positive.author: Isabella Poretsis

positive.text: If you think the world is full of darkness, let us see your light. If you think the world is full of wickedness, let us see your goodness. If you think people are acting wrongly, let us see your right action. If you think people don't know, let us see what you know. If you think the world is full of uncaring people let us see how you care about people. If you think life is not being fair to you, let us see how you can be fair to life. If you think people are proud, let us see your humility. We can easily find fault and we can easily see what is wrong but a positive attitude backed by a right action in a true direction is all we need to survive in peace and harmony in the arena of life.
positive.author: Ernest Agyemang Yeboah

positive.text: A word after a word after a word is power.
positive.author: Margaret Atwood

positive.text: You have the power to realise your dream. If only you are willing and determined.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: If you make fun of bad persons you make yourself beneath them. ... Be kind to bad and good  for you don't know your own heart.
positive.author: Sarah Winnemucca

positive.text: Don’t be a victim of circumstances. Choose victory by gracious endurance.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: 5 rules to live a happier life: 1) Love yourself. 2) Do good. 3) Always forgive. 4) Harm no one. 5) Be positive.
positive.author: Ziad K. Abdelnour

positive.text: Be Happy & Appreciate Every Little Thing You Have/Get Because When You Get The Big Thing, The Happiness Would Be Unbound....
positive.author: Muhammad Imran Hasan

positive.text: Be careful of your thoughts  they may become words at any moment.
positive.author: Ira Gassen

positive.text: Nobody can bring you a change. You have to want to change.
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

positive.text: Journal writing is a voyage to the interior.
positive.author: Christina Baldwin

positive.text: Since I will never know what the future holds, I choose to live my life expecting great things.
positive.author: Meena Sarine

positive.text: Dwell on positive thoughts!
positive.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: Endure despite the pain. The key is grace of strength.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: Strength is not defined by the load you bear, it’s defined by the amount you can bend before breaking.
strength.author: Blake Mays

strength.text: God seemed to be having a hard time killing him, and he'd be damned if he was going to make the job easy for mere mortals.
strength.author: Mario Puzo

strength.text: Your strength is beyond your own imagination.
strength.author: Bryant McGill

strength.text: If you let tragedy change you, You have already lost.
strength.author: Nikki Rowe

strength.text: Achieving your goals depends more on the way you manage to push through the bad days, than shine on the good ones.
strength.author: Lorri Faye

strength.text: Trust your instincts, follow your bliss, make plans, work hard, learn to let things go. Don’t be late. Remember that fortune favors the brave. Live. If you need to run, try and run toward something. Study for tests. Laugh at silly cartoons. Be organized. If you fall seven times, get up eight. Always carry an extra pen. Believe you can do everything. Find your key.
strength.author: Nina Lane

strength.text: My spouse is my shield, my spouse is my strength.
strength.author: Amit Kalantri

strength.text: To cherish my purity and set boundaries are, in my opinion, the highest forms of feminism—a woman who saves her body proves she is strong and secure enough to resist the men who seek to claim her, that she’s more than what lies between her legs.
strength.author: Caroline George

strength.text: The strongest backs bear the heaviest burdens.
strength.author: Will Bly

strength.text: Elena glanced up at him, taking in his words. “If you get rid of your fear? You know, I never look at you as someone who’s afraid.”“That’s because every time you look at me, I’m looking right back, and the only time I’m not afraid, is when I see you. And I do see you, Elena. I see everything you’ve been through, from so young – how you struggled through it; how you never let it destroy your hope and faith – and I’m afraid of nothing.'(Karl and Elena).
strength.author: Dianna Hardy

strength.text: The strength of will is the grace of survival.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: Rise in mighty strength and live your dream.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: People with vision sees opportunity where there is problem. They see money not problem.
strength.author: Patience Johnson

strength.text: When it all comes together, it is oddly beautiful and it makes sense.
strength.author: Greg Dutilly

strength.text: But we are strong, each in our purpose, and we are all more strong together.
strength.author: Bram Stoker

strength.text: An abundant life is one where we are physically strong, mentally sound, and spiritually aflame. I.
strength.author: Toni Sorenson

strength.text: Sic vis pacem para bellum - if you want peace, prepare for war.
strength.author: A.J. Darkholme

strength.text: Courage is the power to let go of the familiar.
strength.author: Raymond Lindquist

strength.text: We can only reach the highest height, if we encourage each other.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita

strength.text: You cannot become the greatest without at least a gr- and a test inside of you.
strength.author: Johnnie Dent Jr.

strength.text: Politics doesn’t mean playing deceitful and trickery games against the people, it means playing resourceful and organized games for the people.
strength.author: Amit Kalantri

strength.text: Luck is for those with nothing else. I wish you strength and courage.
strength.author: Annette Marie

strength.text: Man's delight in the Lord is the absolute peak of human triumph. He praises God when full of joy, and when not, he praises God to become full of joy. For to know and to live as though God is worthy of all praise, in all one's circumstances, whether seemingly good or seemingly bad, is the primary definition of joy and the richest triumph for man under God.
strength.author: Criss Jami

strength.text: Keep your fears to yourself, but share your courage with others.
strength.author: Robert Louis Stevenson

strength.text: We think we are so strong but it is only when others try to prey on our weaknesses that we realize how frail we truly are.”-Skyla (from Twiceborn).
strength.author: JP Robinson

strength.text: All through my life, I have been tested. My will has been tested, my courage has been tested, my strength has been tested. Now my patience and endurance are being tested.
strength.author: Muhammad Ali

strength.text: My expectations were reduced to zero when I was 21. Everything since then has been a bonus.', December 12, 2004)].
strength.author: Stephen Hawking

strength.text: Cassia.I know which life is my real one now, no matter what happens. It’s the one with you. For some reason, knowing that even one person knows my story makes things different. Maybe it’s like the poem says. Maybe this is my way of not going gentle.I love you. (Ky Markham).
strength.author: Ally Condie

strength.text: The strength of the spirit sustains the soul.
strength.author: Lailah Gifty Akita
